mapper.select: SELECT b.book_id AS bookId, b.title AS bookTitle, b.author, b.category AS genre, COUNT(*) AS borrowCount FROM borrow_record br JOIN book b ON br.book_id = b.book_id GROUP BY b.book_id, b.title, b.author, b.category ORDER BY borrowCount DESC LIMIT 10
